{"id":753051793,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1658422772,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/753051793/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int i =0 ;\n        int j = s.size() -1 ;\n        while(i<j){\n            if(!isalnum(s[i])){\n                i++;\n            }\n            else if (!isalnum(s[j])){\n                j --;\n            }\n            else {\n                if(tolower(s[i])!= tolower(s[j])){\n                    return false ;\n                }\n                i++;j--;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return true ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
